News.headline: Match Preview: Torquay United v Dagenham and Redbridge 201617
News.page_title: Match Preview: Torquay United v Dagenham and Redbridge 201617
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Torquay United v Dagenham and Redbridge 201617
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers National League away fixture against Torquay United tonight.
News.description:
The Daggers are looking to make it three away wins on the bounce as they sit top of the National League.
 
Daggers opponents, Torquay sit in 17th place, with 14 points from their first 13 games.
 
Previous 5 Results 
 
Daggers
Daggers 0-0 Tranmere
Bromley 1-3 Daggers
Daggers 2-0 North Ferriby
Daggers 2-0 Dover 
Solihull Moors 2-5 Dag & Red 
   
Torquay United
Gateshead 0-0 Torquay
Torquay 2-3 Maidstone
Boreham Wood 2-0 Torquay
Woking 3-1 Torquay
Torquay 2-0 York
 
Team News
The Daggers could be unchanged for the sixth game in a row. 
   
Previous Meetings
The teams have met eight times before with the Daggers winning three, drawing four and losing four. The most recent match ending in a 1-0 away win for the Daggers in April 2014
 
National League
There is a full list of fixtures in the league on Tuesday. All kick off at 7:45pm unless stated. 
 Aldershot V Forest Green
Barrow v Macclesfield
Braintree V Boreham Wood
Bromley v Woking
Dover v Sutton
Eastleigh V Maidstone
Guiseley V York
North Ferriby V Chester
Solihull V Southport
Torquay V Dagenham and Redbridge
Tranmere V Gateshead
Wrexham V Lincoln City
 
Tickets 
Ticket information for the game can be found here. 
   
Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebook page (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on on the website.
